title: Still haven't got my Poro Icon
body:
So i haven't got my poro icon, got my Kayle skin tough and i was wondering if anyone has the same problem.

PS : Speaking of icons for some reason i can't change my boards icon either.

replies.body: Gifts are still being sent out, so a lot of players haven't received their goodies yet.  We havee a [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) that will be offering updates.  Regarding your boards icon, it can take a bit to sync up with your account, so it will update.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6ikEMg84,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T16:02:35.511+0000)
>
> Gifts are still being sent out, so a lot of players haven't received their goodies yet.  We havee a [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) that will be offering updates.  Regarding your boards icon, it can take a bit to sync up with your account, so it will update.  Hang tight!

Hey man thanks for the quick reply i shall wait for my fancy party poro icon than.

Oh and regarding the boards icon i tried to changed it and it didn't synced even after months, not a big problem i was just wandering about it. Thanks again for the answer.
I goy kayle skin but didnt get the icon yet is their a problem ?

Nope!  Not everything is being sent out at the same time, per the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It'll be a bit of time for everything to finish!
